Package org.mixare

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Compatibility
    Ensures compatibility with older and newer versions of the API.
    DataView
    This class is able to update the markers and the radar.
    ImageMarker
    Local Image Marker that handles drawing images locally (extents LocalMarker) Note: LinkURL is the url when marker is clicked on.
    LocalMarker
    The class represents a marker and contains its information.
    MainActivity
    This is the main activity of mixare, that will be opened if mixare is launched through the android.intent.action.MAIN the main tasks of this activity is showing a prompt dialog where the user can decide to launch the plugins, or not to launch the plugins.
    MixContext
    Cares about location management and about the data (source, inputstream)
    MixListView
    This class holds vectors with informaction about sources, their description and whether they have been selected.
    MixMap
    This class creates the map view and its overlay.
    MixState
    This class calculates the bearing and pitch out of the angles
    MixView
    This class is the main application which uses the other classes for different functionalities.
    NavigationMarker
    A NavigationMarker is displayed as an arrow at the bottom of the screen.
    PluginLoaderActivity
    This is the plugin loading activity for mixare.
    POIMarker
    This markers represent the points of interest.
    SocialMarker
    The SocialMarker class represents a marker, which contains data from sources like twitter etc.
